Dev Night Out at Activate Games

JUST ANNOUNCED! Compete with fellow game developers to master room-scale games! Join us on Saturday, April 5th, at 6:00PM to jump, climb, and problem solve challenges for 75 minutes. Afterwards, we'll cool off with a discussion on what we would change or improve about the games at Andy's. Tickets are $30/player and you are welcome to bring a friend. Water will be provided and tennis shoes are a must!
